item.title: Ok, simple compile error, adding in a teleblock, picture inside@@
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

THE PERSON WHO GETS THIS RIGHT I WILL REP++:

Ok I added a command on a tab, but I didnt want it to work, if you were teleblocked, this is what I needed to add:

if(teleblocked == true){ sendMessage("A mysterious force stops you from teleporting"); } else { //case 170 }

This is how I added it to case 170:

case 170: // pkbox2 emote customCommand("Pkbox2"); break; if(teleblocked == true){ sendMessage("A mysterious force stops you from teleporting"); } else { //case 170 }

But I get this error:

Do I need to add something in Public boolean process() ??

Many Thanks Musicmad[br][size=1]Posted on: July 28, 2007, 02:18:59 PM[/size][hr]do I add a void?

Read full topic
